description: Whip up these flavour-packed satay chicken noodles for a quick and easy dinner. Enjoy juicy grilled chicken, creamy satay sauce and crunchy peanuts.
name: 15-Minute Satay Noodles With Grilled Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 288 g Maggi 2 Minute instant noodles chicken
43 g Maggi satay chicken recipe base
2 tbs Macro Organic smooth peanut butter

recipeInstructions.text: Divide noodles among bowls. Top with chicken and spoon over a little of the reserved sauce. Scatter over peanuts and coriander. Serve with lime wedges and remaining reserved sauce
Divide noodles among bowls. Top with chicken and spoon over a little of the reserved sauce. Scatter over peanuts and coriander. Serve with lime wedges and remaining reserved sauce
